entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:39 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 1:30 PM NST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 15 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 110 over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
